name: retrieve and aggregate data using the external data source

content.query:
USE Sales;
 GO;
    
 SELECT Item AS Product,
        SUM(Quantity) AS ItemsSold,
        ROUND(SUM(UnitPrice) - SUM(TaxAmount), 2) AS NetRevenue
 FROM
     OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'sales/csv/*.csv',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
         PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
         HEADER_ROW = TRUE
     ) AS orders
 GROUP BY Item;
